file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-20-01-02 - NOSE-LANDING-GEAR LEG - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE-LANDING-GEAR LEG - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to restore the nose landing gear leg. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 32-20-01-900-801-A ♦ NLG LEG - RESTORATION NLG SLIDING TUBE ASSY - RESTORA- ALL 32-20-01-900-802-A TION NLG STEERING CUFF ASSY - RESTORA- ALL 32-20-01-900-803-A TION NLG TORQUE LINK ASSY - RESTORA- ALL 32-20-01-900-804-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-20-01 Page 1 of 10 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-01-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. NLG LEG - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) 32-21-10 to restore the NLG leg. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400 NOSE LANDING-GEAR LEG - REMOVAL AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400 NOSE LANDING-GEAR LEG - INSTALLATION SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Remove the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400). J. Restore Nose Landing Gear (NLG) (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Refer to the last revision of LIEBHERR CMM 32-21-10 to restore the NLG leg. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-20-01 Page 2 of 10 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-20-01 Page 3 of 10 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL NLG Leg - Restoration Figure 201 A ZONE 711 NLG LEG DET. A 145AMM320059.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-20-01 Page 4 of 10 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-01-900-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. NLG SLIDING TUBE ASSY - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) 32-21-10 to restore the NLG Sliding Tube Assy. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400 NOSE LANDING-GEAR LEG - REMOVAL AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400 NOSE LANDING-GEAR LEG - INSTALLATION SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-007-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Remove the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400). AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Restore Nose Landing Gear (NLG) Sliding Tube Assy SUBTASK 900-007-A (1) Refer to the last revision of LIEBHERR CMM 32-21-10 to restore the NLG Sliding Tube Assy. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-007-A (1) Install the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-01-900-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. NLG STEERING CUFF ASSY - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) 32-21-10 to restore the NLG Steering Cuff Assy. B. Preparation SUBTASK 841-009-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Remove the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400). AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Restore Nose Landing Gear (NLG) Steering Cuff Assy SUBTASK 900-009-A (1) Refer to the last revision of LIEBHERR CMM 32-21-10 to restore the NLG Steering Cuff Assy. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-009-A (1) Install the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). General (1) Refer to the Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) 32-21-10 to restore the NLG Torque Link Assy. B. (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Remove the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400). AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Restore Nose Landing Gear (NLG) Torque Link Assy SUBTASK 900-011-A (1) Refer to the last revision of LIEBHERR CMM 32-21-10 to restore the NLG Torque Link Assy. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-011-A (1) Install the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200).
